text: Acorn Stores were a chain of clothing shops in the United States. The company closed in until 2008.C&B; Corporation to close Acorn division The stores were originally part of the Michael L. Wallace Inc, until they were bought by Christopher & Banks in November 2004. ==References== Category:American clothing companies Category:1998 establishments in the United States Category:2008 disestablishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Minnesota
title: Acorn Stores
